languages.text: "Здесь. Главным дельцом станции являюсь я, и было бы неуважением с моей стороны предлагать вам вести дела с менее значимыми торговцами Футфола. Впрочем, пара примечательных людей может вас заинтересовать — например, епископ Иеронимус Скорбный. Этот слуга Экклезиархии, по слухам, скупает священные реликвии у капитанов, и другие торговцы не стремятся вступать с ним в конкуренцию".

traits.locale_text: "Здесь. Главный дельцом станции являюсь я, и было бы неуважением с моей стороны предлагать вам вести дела с менее значимыми торговцами Футфола. Впрочем, пара примечательных людей может вас заинтересовать — например, епископ Иеронимус Скорбный. Этот слуга Экклезиархии, по слухам, скупает священные реликвии у капитанов, и другие торговцы не стремятся вступать с ним в конкуренцию".

languages.text: "Here. I am the main dealer on the station, and it would be disrespectful of me to suggest that you take your business to Footfall traders of lesser importance. Still, you might take an interest in a few people of note — for example, Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso. This servant of the Ecclesiarchy is rumoured to purchase sacred relics from captains, and other traders don't seem keen on becoming his competitors."

Впрочем, пара примечательных людей может вас заинтересовать — например, епископ Иеронимус Скорбный. Этот слуга Экклезиархии, по слухам, скупает священные реликвии у капитанов, и другие торговцы не стремятся вступать с ним в конкуренцию".

Still, you might take an interest in a few people of note — for example, Bishop Hieronimus Doloroso. This servant of the Ecclesiarchy is rumored to purchase sacred relics from captains, and other traders don't seem keen on becoming his competitors."

Still, you might take an interest in a few people of note — for example, Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso. This servant of the Ecclesiarchy is rumoured to purchase sacred relics from captains, and other traders don't seem keen on becoming his competitors."

languages.text: 「ほら、私こそがステーションの主要な商人だ。フットフォールの些細なトレーダーに君とのビジネスを勧めれば失礼にあたる。それでも、君は何人か有名な人物、たとえばヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭に興味を持つのではないだろうか。この帝国聖教会の従者は中隊長から神聖な遺物を購入しているとの噂があって、他のトレーダーは司祭の競争相手になることに尻込みしている」
languages.original_text: "Here. I am the main dealer on the station, and it would be disrespectful of me to suggest that you take your business to Footfall traders of lesser importance. Still, you might take an interest in a few people of note — for example, Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso. This servant of the Ecclesiarchy is rumoured to purchase sacred relics from captains, and other traders don't seem keen on becoming his competitors."

traits.locale_text: 「ほら、私こそがステーションの主要な商人だ。フットフォールの些細なトレーダーに君とのビジネスを勧めれば失礼にあたる。それでも、君は何人か有名な人物、たとえばヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭に興味を持つのではないだろうか。この帝国聖教会の従者は中隊長から神聖な遺物を購入しているとの噂があって、他のトレーダーは司祭の競争相手になることに尻込みしている」

languages.text: “就在这里。我就是落脚港最主要的贸易商，如果您把生意交给那些不太重要的商人，那对我可就太不尊重了。不过，您可能会对某些知名人士感兴趣，比如希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师。据说，这位国教的仆人会从各位舰长那里收购圣遗物，而其他商人似乎无意与他竞争。”
languages.original_text: "Here. I am the main dealer on the station, and it would be disrespectful of me to suggest that you take your business to Footfall traders of lesser importance. Still, you might take an interest in a few people of note — for example, Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso. This servant of the Ecclesiarchy is rumoured to purchase sacred relics from captains, and other traders don't seem keen on becoming his competitors."

traits.locale_text: “就在这里。我就是落脚港最主要的贸易商，如果您把生意交给那些不太重要的商人，那对我可就太不尊重了。不过，您可能会对某些知名人士感兴趣，比如希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师。据说，这位国教的仆人会从各位舰长那里收购圣遗物，而其他商人似乎无意与他竞争。”

languages.text: «Aquí mismo. Yo soy el principal comerciante de la estación y sería una falta de respeto por mi parte sugerirle que traslade sus negocios a comerciantes irrelevantes de Paso. Sin embargo, podrían interesarle ciertas personas de renombre, por ejemplo, el reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso. Se comenta que este siervo de la Eclesiarquía compra reliquias sagradas a los capitanes, por lo que existen comerciantes que no parecen muy dispuestos a convertirse en sus competidores».
languages.original_text: "Here. I am the main dealer on the station, and it would be disrespectful of me to suggest that you take your business to Footfall traders of lesser importance. Still, you might take an interest in a few people of note — for example, Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso. This servant of the Ecclesiarchy is rumoured to purchase sacred relics from captains, and other traders don't seem keen on becoming his competitors."

traits.locale_text: «Aquí mismo. Yo soy el principal comerciante de la estación y sería una falta de respeto por mi parte sugerirle que traslade sus negocios a comerciantes irrelevantes de Paso. Sin embargo, podrían interesarle ciertas personas de renombre, por ejemplo, el reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso. Se comenta que este siervo de la Eclesiarquía compra reliquias sagradas a los capitanes, por lo que existen comerciantes que no parecen muy dispuestos a convertirse en sus competidores».

languages.text: « Ici. Je suis le principal marchand de Castel, et ce serait vous manquer de respect que de vous suggérer d'aller faire vos achats chez d'autres négociants moins importants. Il y a toutefois quelques personnes qui pourraient vous intéresser, comme le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso. On raconte que ce serviteur de l'Ecclésiarchie achèterait des reliques sacrées à des capitaines, et les autres marchands n'ont pas l'air d'avoir envie de lui faire de la concurrence. »
languages.original_text: "Here. I am the main dealer on the station, and it would be disrespectful of me to suggest that you take your business to Footfall traders of lesser importance. Still, you might take an interest in a few people of note — for example, Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso. This servant of the Ecclesiarchy is rumoured to purchase sacred relics from captains, and other traders don't seem keen on becoming his competitors."

traits.locale_text: « Ici. Je suis le principal marchand de Castel, et ce serait vous manquer de respect que de vous suggérer d'aller faire vos achats chez d'autres négociants moins importants. Il y a toutefois quelques personnes qui pourraient vous intéresser, comme le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso. On raconte que ce serviteur de l'Ecclésiarchie achèterait des reliques sacrées à des capitaines, et les autres marchands n'ont pas l'air d'avoir envie de lui faire de la concurrence. »

languages.text: "Hierher. Ich bin der wichtigste Händler auf der Station, und es wäre respektlos von mir, Euch zu raten, auf Footfall andere, unbedeutendere Händler aufzusuchen. Dennoch gibt es da einige vielleicht für Euch interessante Personen – zum Beispiel Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso. Dieser Diener der Ekklesiarchie kauft angeblich heilige Relikte von Captains, und andere Händler scheinen nicht mit ihm in Konkurrenz treten zu wollen."
languages.original_text: "Here. I am the main dealer on the station, and it would be disrespectful of me to suggest that you take your business to Footfall traders of lesser importance. Still, you might take an interest in a few people of note — for example, Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso. This servant of the Ecclesiarchy is rumoured to purchase sacred relics from captains, and other traders don't seem keen on becoming his competitors."

traits.locale_text: "Hierher. Ich bin der wichtigste Händler auf der Station, und es wäre respektlos von mir, Euch zu raten, auf Footfall andere, unbedeutendere Händler aufzusuchen. Dennoch gibt es da einige vielleicht für Euch interessante Personen – zum Beispiel Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso. Dieser Diener der Ekklesiarchie kauft angeblich heilige Relikte von Captains, und andere Händler scheinen nicht mit ihm in Konkurrenz treten zu wollen."

languages.text: "Buraya. Bendeniz istasyondaki ana satıcıyım. İşinizi daha az öneme haiz Binliman tacirlerinde görmenizi önermek şahsınıza saygısızlık olur. Yine de Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso gibi birkaç mühim şahsiyet de ilginizi çekebilir. Kendisi Ekleşiarşi'nin hizmetkârı olup kaptanlardan kutsal yadigârlar satın aldığı söylenir. Diğer tacirler de kendisine rakip olmaya pek hevesli değiller."
languages.original_text: "Here. I am the main dealer on the station, and it would be disrespectful of me to suggest that you take your business to Footfall traders of lesser importance. Still, you might take an interest in a few people of note — for example, Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso. This servant of the Ecclesiarchy is rumoured to purchase sacred relics from captains, and other traders don't seem keen on becoming his competitors."

traits.locale_text: "Buraya. İstasyondaki ana satıcı benim, işinizi daha az nüfuza haiz bir Binliman tacirinde görmenizi önermek saygısızlık olur. Yine de Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso gibi birkaç önemli kişi ilginizi çekebilir. Ekleşiarşi'nin hizmetkârının kaptanlardan kutsal emanetler satın aldığı söyleniyor, diğer tacirler ise rakibi olmaya pek hevesli değil."
